医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究揭示疱疹和阿尔茨海默病之间的惊人联系匹兹堡大学的研究人员发现了阿尔茨海默病和单纯疱疹病毒 1 (HSV-1) 之间的惊人联系，表明病毒感染可能在该疾病中发挥作用。该研究结果今天发表在《细胞报告》上。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Study-reveals-surprising-connection- Between-herpes-and-Alzheimers.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Study-reveals-surprising-connection- Between-herpes-and-Alzheimers.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c9147cdb-a30a-48b7-b955-732ca3a440b4 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 20:17:15 -0500 Study reveals surprising connection between herpes and Alzheimer's
血细胞与持久的疫苗免疫力有关当儿童在进入幼儿园时接受第二次麻疹、腮腺炎、风疹疫苗时，他们一生或大部分时间都会获得针对所有三种病毒的保护。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Blood-cells-linked-to-long-having-vaccine-immunity.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Blood-cells-linked-to-long-having-vaccine-immunity.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bef99b63-e62b-4a12-8f45-7bf89d2ccd68 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 20:12:38 -0500 Blood cells linked to long-lasting vaccine immunity
睡眠不足会扰乱阻止不需要的记忆的大脑区域东安格利亚大学 (UEA) 的研究表明，睡眠质量不佳与心理健康问题之间的联系可能与大脑区域的缺陷有关，这些区域会抑制不良想法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Sleep-deprivation-disrupts-brain-regions-that-prevent-unwanted-memories.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Sleep-deprivation-disrupts-brain-regions-that-prevent-unwanted-memories.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=70ae4ef2-5336-4618-ac01-f2684b0650ca Thu, 02 Jan 2025 20:07:32 -0500 Sleep deprivation disrupts brain regions that prevent unwanted memories
特殊的骨髓生态位揭示了免疫耐受的秘密研究人员发现了骨髓微环境中免疫特权干细胞的分层结构，揭示了它们的再生潜力和治疗相关性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Specialized-bone-marrow-niches-reveal-secrets-of-immune-tolerance.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Specialized-bone-marrow-niches-reveal-secrets-of-immune-tolerance.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d9cf3deb-05e4-4ec9-959a-d011d2ad9252 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 20:05:00 -0500 Specialized bone marrow niches reveal secrets of immune tolerance
研究人员开发了测量单个细胞类型生物年龄的工具一篇新的优先研究论文于 2024 年 12 月 29 日发表，作为 Aging 的封面（MEDLINE/PubMed 列为“Aging (Albany NY)”，Web of Science 列为“Aging-US”）第 16 卷第 22 期该论文的标题是“以细胞类型分辨率量化生物年龄的细胞类型特异性表观遗传时钟”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Researchers-develop-tool-to-measure-biological-age-in-individual-cell-types.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Researchers-develop-tool-to-measure-biological-age-in-individual-cell-types.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5674ed60-e18d-43ae-949f-4876b22ac9ce Thu, 02 Jan 2025 20:02:07 -0500 Researchers develop tool to measure biological age in individual cell types
MICAL2 酶被发现可促进胰腺癌的肿瘤生长据美国国家癌症研究所称，胰腺癌每年夺去 50,000 人的生命，而且该疾病几乎没有有效的治疗方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/MICAL2-enzyme-found-to-promote-tumor-growth-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/MICAL2-enzyme-found-to-promote-tumor-growth-in-pancreatic-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9269ed51-6884-4ce7-a8af-1ac875cbf6e9 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 19:57:59 -0500 MICAL2 enzyme found to promote tumor growth in pancreatic cancer
调查：不到 10% 的美国人计划在新年尝试植物性饮食根据负责任医学医师委员会/晨间咨询的一项新调查，近一半的美国成年人表示，开始新的饮食习惯是他们的新年决心之一。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Survey-Fewer-than-1025-of-Americans-plan-to-try-plant-based-diets-this-New-Year.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Survey-Fewer-than-1025-of-Americans-plan-to-try-plant-based-diets-this-New-Year.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1852798-f381-4c3f-8fe3-99be9a060a9e Thu, 02 Jan 2025 19:52:48 -0500 Survey: Fewer than 10% of Americans plan to try plant-based diets this New Year
新型人造肌肉模仿天然组织，具有高弹性和韧性南京大学化学化工学院李成辉博士和南京医科大学儿童医院郑鹏飞博士领导的研究成功研制出机械性能与天然肌肉组织相似的人造肌肉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-artificial-muscle-mimics-natural-tissue-with-high-elasticity-and-toughness.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-artificial-muscle-mimics-natural-tissue-with-high-elasticity-and-toughness.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d8bcec1-2587-4cd2-a814-d8177dafe997 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 19:47:58 -0500 New artificial muscle mimics natural tissue with high elasticity and toughness
研究揭示了了解肾癌治疗变异性的关键对抗癌症似乎是一场致命的机会游戏。虽然有些患者可能对某些治疗反应良好，但其他患者可能就没那么幸运了。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Research-reveals-key-to-understanding-kidney-cancer-treatment-variability.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Research-reveals-key-to-understanding-kidney-cancer-treatment-variability.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=9853f611-8088-4fbc-9b82-31f6799669c5 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 19:43:54 -0500 Research reveals key to understanding kidney cancer treatment variability
组蛋白标记预测人类年龄的准确性可与 DNA 甲基化时钟相媲美研究人员推出了基于组蛋白的年龄预测因子，为了解表观遗传衰老及其跨组织的共享模式提供了一个新窗口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Histone-markers-predict- human-age-with-accuracy-comparable-to-DNA-methylation-clocks.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Histone-markers-predict- human-age-with-accuracy-comparable-to-DNA-methylation-clocks.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=97225820-8b1d-43e0-87dc-13123927fa0a Thu, 02 Jan 2025 19:36:00 -0500 Histone markers predict human age with accuracy comparable to DNA methylation clocks
